meanings.definition: To make a gesture or gestures.
meanings.sent1: She was gesturing wildly to get his attention.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys gesturing while telling stories.
meanings.sent3: The robot started gesturing in a robotic dance.
meanings.sent4: The wind was gesturing through the trees, creating a symphony of movement.
meanings.sent5: The magician was gesturing with his wand, casting spells on the audience.

meanings.definition: A movement of part of the body, especially a hand or the head, to express an idea or meaning.
meanings.sent1: Her gesturing was so expressive that no words were needed.
meanings.sent2: The speaker's gesturing added emphasis to his speech.
meanings.sent3: The cat's gesturing for food was impossible to ignore.
meanings.sent4: The waves were gesturing wildly, crashing against the shore.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's gesturing was like poetry in motion.
